name: Mattles
description:
Hey ! First of all, thanks for playing our game.

I made this game with my 2 friends Teno0 and Vico08lv for the Mini Jam 71 : Puzzles, it's a game that combines puzzles (mathematical one) and something like a roguelike and a turn based pokemon style. I didn't have the time to implement procedural level generation in the end so it's just a single level and your goal is to destroy all machines !

Controls : WASD / Arrow_Keys + Mouse

Tutorial : A fight is composed of rounds in which you have to fill (ALL) the slots with your given numbers and symbols to reach a certain number (you ALWAYS can reach that number exactly). You do more damage the closer you are and if you get a perfect (your number = wanted number) you stun the enemy !

Good luck on your adventure to destroy all machines !
